title: Alik Bahshi
author: Alik Bahshi
content: Alik BahshiWho can answer a simple question?    I would be grateful if someone would give at least one example when Putin told the truth? Thank you.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: What proof does anyone have of any politician or government leader telling the truth?

comments.author: CryptocurencyKing
comments.body: Quote from: Alik Bahshi on July 17, 2022, 10:45:18 AM Who can answer a simple question?    I would be grateful if someone would give at least one example when Putin told the truth? Thank you.Politics is without doubt a dirty game, a game of tricks which indeed means you've got to be a very good lier to hide your motives while archiving the goals.Although there are certain times when the truth is let out and I'll quote Putin on one sad one;“I have decided to conduct a special military operation,”I guess this is one truth with all the chaos we have in Ukraine and the world today. The goal remains simple though, to protect the closest Ukrainian states and Russia from a regime!

comments.author: Newlifebtc
comments.body: Quote from: Alik Bahshi on July 17, 2022, 10:45:18 AM    Alik BahshiWho can answer a simple question?    I would be grateful if someone would give at least one example when Putin told the truth? Thank you.We are not there or with him to know when he speaks the truth, i don't understand exactly and when it tell people truth, maybe through internet people who is from far away country will know when president of another country is talking Truth in her country, if the president us bad from the way you notice him, the same president is good to another person
